scripts.typecheck:apps: bun run typecheck:web && bun run typecheck:dashboard && bun run typecheck:api
scripts.typecheck:packages: bun run typecheck:pkg-ui-web && bun run typecheck:pkg-i18n && bun run typecheck:pkg-sdk && bun run typecheck:pkg-domain-schemas && bun run typecheck:pkg-onboarding-core
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && doppler run -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:web: cd apps/web && doppler run -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:dashboard: cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:admin: cd ops/admin && doppler run -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:auth: cd apps/auth && doppler run -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:services: doppler run -p services -c dev -- sh -c "cd services && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d"
scripts.dev:services:build: doppler run -p services -c dev -- doppler run -p maxmove-api -c dev -- sh -c "cd services && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.build.yml up -d --build"
scripts.dev:services:migrate: doppler run -p services -c dev -- sh -c "cd services && cd .. && make migrate DB_URL=$SERVICES_DATABASE_URL"
scripts.dev:services:down: doppler run -p services -c dev -- doppler run -p maxmove-api -c dev -- sh -c "cd services && docker compose --profile api -f docker-compose.yml down"
scripts.dev:backend: bun run dev:services && cd apps/api && doppler run -p maxmove-api -c dev -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:api:docker: doppler run -p services -c dev -- doppler run -p maxmove-api -c dev -- sh -c "cd services && docker compose --profile api -f docker-compose.yml pull api && docker compose --profile api -f docker-compose.yml up -d api"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently -k --names "mc,md" "cd apps/mobile-customer && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/mobile-driver && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.dev:web:all: concurrently -k --names "web,dashboard,admin" "cd apps/web && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd ops/admin && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.dev:max: bun run dev:services && concurrently -k --names "api,web,auth,dashboard,admin" "cd apps/api && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/web && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/auth && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd ops/admin && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.dev:max:local: bun run dev:services:build && concurrently -k --names "api,web,auth,dashboard,admin" "cd apps/api && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/web && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/auth && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd ops/admin && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.dev:apps: concurrently -k --names "api,auth,dashboard" "cd apps/api && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/auth && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.dev:clean: bun run dev:services && concurrently -k --names "api,auth,dashboard" "cd apps/api && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/auth && doppler run -- bun run dev" "cd apps/dashboard && doppler run -- bun run dev"
scripts.auth:migrate: cd apps/api && doppler run -- npx @better-auth/cli migrate --config auth.cli.ts
scripts.generate:proto:check: buf lint proto && buf breaking proto --against '.git#branch=main'
scripts.lint:go: cd services && for svc in order-svc dispatch-svc payments-svc vehicles-svc chat-svc ws-gateway pkg; do echo "=== $svc ===" && (cd $svc && go vet ./... && go run honnef.co/go/tools/cmd/staticcheck@latest ./...); done
scripts.lint:go:connect: cd services && for svc in order-svc dispatch-svc payments-svc vehicles-svc chat-svc ws-gateway pkg; do echo "=== $svc (connect tags) ===" && (cd $svc && go vet -tags=connect ./... && go run honnef.co/go/tools/cmd/staticcheck@latest -tags=connect ./...); done
scripts.lint:go:security: cd services && for svc in order-svc dispatch-svc payments-svc vehicles-svc chat-svc ws-gateway pkg; do echo "=== $svc ===" && (cd $svc && go run github.com/securego/gosec/v2/cmd/gosec@latest -quiet ./...); done
